articles.title: ECONOMIC OUTLOOK: SA Reserve Bank set to pull the trigger again, taking the prime lending rate back above 10% - Daily Maverick
articles.description: The South African Reserve Bank is set to raise its key repo rate again this week, with most economists forecasting a hike of at least 75 basis points. This will take the prime lending rate to 10.5%. As policy ‘normalisation’ continues apace in the US and else…
articles.content:
The SA Reserve Banks Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) will deliver another big rate hike on Thursday, 24 November, when its last scheduled three-day meeting for 2022 wraps up.

articles.title: Mendy's dubious goalkeeping sees Netherlands snatch late win against Senegal - News24
articles.description: Late goals by Cody Gakpo and Davy Klaassen gave the Netherlands a 2-0 victory over African champions Senegal on Monday on their return to the World Cup stage.
articles.content:
